body_html:
@rmlarsen you are right.

While I did run the eigen unit tests (CUDA and HIP) with these changes, for tesnorflow, only the HIP side was tested. That would explain why I missed the error in the CUDA test. Sorry about that, please apply the fix as need, and thank you.

body:
@rmlarsen you are right.

While I did run the eigen unit tests (CUDA and HIP) with these changes, for tesnorflow, only the HIP side was tested. That would explain why I missed the error in the CUDA test. Sorry about that, please apply the fix as need, and thank you.
